MatchedRegion.transcript: First, I will describe the generalized associative memory model which we extend in our work.
Until recently, energy models were constrained to retrieve single memories from a set of stored memories.

MatchedRegion.Text: GAMM can store and retrieve singleton memories.

MatchedRegion.transcript: These models have a generalized associative memory model (GAMM), composed of two layers of neurons with symmetric interactions.
The symmetry leads to a dissipative dynamical system that converges to a single state under mild conditions.
